items.title: Stocks To Watch: Patanjali Foods, Zydus Life, Max Health, Tata Power, MTNL
items.description: The US FDA has issued a warning letter to Zydus Lifesciences citing significant manufacturing lapses at its Gujarat-based plant.

items.title: Nifty50 index bullish on tech charts; buy dips? Here's what analysts say
items.description: The NIFTY 50 index is exhibiting a bullish trend on the charts, making it an attractive option for traders seeking to capitalise on the ongoing upward momentum.

items.title: Jigar S Patel of Anand Rathi recommends buying these three stocks today
items.description: Recently, IRCTC's stock price has been consolidating around its 200-day Exponential Moving Average (DEMA), which is often seen as a critical support level.

items.title: Buy & Sell Ideas for Sep 16; top stock picks by Rajesh Bhosale of Angel One
items.description: For over 8 months, CEAT has faced resistance around the 2,900 level. However, prices have now broken this range, confirming a strong 'Inverse Head and Shoulders' breakout

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for India markets; Asia markets mixed
items.description: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Markets in India were likely to start marginally higher, even as investors around the world digested weak economic data released over the weekend, in China.

items.title: Market today: Settlement holiday, US Fed policy, Bajaj Housing IPO listing
items.description: Markets this week will majorly eye the US Fed's policy decision, apart from that other important economic data and IPOs will be on the radar

items.title: F&O Insights: FIIs up long bets in Nifty; 7 stocks in F&O ban today
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 16: Bank Nifty Sept futures traded at a discount to spot for the 2nd straight day on Friday. Among stocks, Muthoot Fin, Can Fin Homes, Bharat Forge saw long buildup.

items.title: Asia stocks on tenterhooks as Fed faces crunch time ahead of rate cut
items.description: Geopolitics loomed large as ever with Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump the subject of a second assassination attempt on Sunday according to the FB

items.title: Bajaj Housing Finance debuts with a Bang: lists at 114% premium on bourses
items.description: Bajaj Housing Finance shares listed at Rs 150, surging 114.28 per cent above the IPO issue price of Rs 70, on the BSE

items.title: Dwarikesh Sugar, Shree Renuka: Why sugar stocks are buzzing in trade today
items.description: Key players in the sector, including Shree Renuka Sugars, Dhampur Sugars, and Balrampur Chini Mills, were among the top gainers.

items.title: Kross debuts flat on BSE, NSE at Rs 240; no listing gain for investors
items.description: Shares of auto parts manufacturer Kross made a sluggish start on the bourses on Monday. On the BSE, Kross shares listed at Rs 240, synonymous with its the issue price of Rs 240

items.title: Tolins Tyres debuts flat on NSE, BSE; hits 5% upper circuit post listing
items.description: Tolins Tyres shares listed at Rs 227 on the BSE, merely Re 1 higher than the IPO issue price of Rs 226, on Monday

items.title: Adani Power, Adani Green rise upto 8% on power supply deal with Maha Discom
items.description: The uptick in the share prices of these companies came on the back of securing a letter of intent (LoI) form Maharashtra state DISCOM for supply of 6,600 MW hybrid solar and thermal power.

items.title: US Fed rate cut: Watch these levels on Sensex, Nifty, Nifty IT this week
items.description: The BSE Sensex, NSE Nifty can gain another 2% from present levels; while the Nifty IT index could see a sharp 6% rally; suggests technical charts.

items.title: This pharma stock has zoomed 179% so far in CY24; Antique sees more upside
items.description: Shares of Shilpa Medicare hit a new high of Rs 922, gaining 4% in Monday's intra-day trade after Antique Stock Broking initiate coverage on the stock with a BUY rating and a target price of Rs 1,300.

items.title: India bond yields start flattish, with eyes on Fed monetary policy decision
items.description: The probability of a 50-basis-point cut has more than quadrupled to 59% from just 14% last week, with a total of 119 bps in cuts now expected in 2024

items.title: Arkade Developers IPO GMP zooms 62% on opening day; should you subscribe?
items.description: Unlisted shares of Arkade Developers were trading at a premium of Rs 80, which translates to a GMP of 62.5 per cent  against the upper end of the IPO price of Rs 128

items.title: Pharma stocks: Nomura gives 'Buy' to Lupin remains 'Neutral' on others
items.description: Lupin  is preparing the launch of PredForte, having a market of $200 million with 180 days competitive generic therapy  (CGT) exclusivity in the near term

items.title: LT Foods, KRBL surge up to 10% after government removes MEP on basmati rice
items.description: Shares of LT Foods hit a record high of Rs 446.30, as they rallied 10% and KRBL soared 7% to Rs 324.30, after the government lifted the minimum export price on basmati rice.

items.title: Apollo Micro Systems shares gain 4% on securing Rs 77 crore order; details
items.description: The uptick in Apollo Micro Systems share price came on the back of multiple order wins worth Rs 77 crore.

items.title: Here's why Thermax share price surged over 6% on September 16; details
items.description: The uptick in Thermax share price came after the company announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary has received a repeat order worth Rs 516 crore.

items.title: Northern Arc Capital IPO opens with 60% GMP; should you park your money?
items.description: Northern Arc Capital IPO is available at a price band of Rs 249-263, with a lot size of 57 shares. Thus, investors can bid for a minimum of 57 shares and in multiples thereof

items.title: Lumax Auto acquires majority stake in Greenfuel Energy; stock flies 9%
items.description: The uptick in the share price came after the company announced the acquisition of a majority stake in Greenfuel Energy Solutions Private Limited (Greenfuel) from its existing shareholders.

items.title: India Shelter down 6.8% after 7.5 mn shares change hands
items.description: The run on the housing finance company's stock came after around 7.5 million shares changed hands on the counter

items.title: Bajaj Finance, housing finance cos dip up to 6% post Bajaj Housing listing
items.description: LIC Housing Finance, PNB Housing Finance, Can Fin Homes and Bajaj Finance dropped in the range of 4 per cent to 6 per cent

items.title: US Fed rate cut: MCX Gold eyes new high; Silver can zoom to Rs 1,00,000
items.description: Technical charts suggests that the bias for Gold is likely to remain positive as long as Rs 73,100 holds; while in case of Silver the bullish pivot stands at Rs 89,000.

items.title: HG Infra Engg stock surges 5% after subsidiary acquires new solar power cos
items.description: Shares of civil construction firm HG Infra Engineering rose as much as 5.12 per cent on BSE at Rs 1,644.15 per share on Monday's intraday trade

items.title: Dixon rallies 6% as unit signs MOU with Asus for manufacturing notebooks
items.description: In the past one year, Dixon Tech has zoomed 182 per cent, compared to the nearly 23 per cent surge in the BSE Sensex during the same period.

items.title: Orient Technologies Q1 PAT rises over 30% YoY; stock gains 6%
items.description: Orient Technologies registered a strong performance in Q1FY25, the first quarter for which it has reported results after listing on the bourses, with its PAT rising over 30 per cent Y-o-Y

items.title: Sebi withdraws statement blaming 'external elements' for employee protests
items.description: Sebi on Monday retracted its statement that "external elements" were behind employee protests against its work culture. The regulator emphasised it will handle the issues internally

items.title: Phoenix Mills fixes Sept 21 as record date for 1:1 bonus issue; stock up 4%
items.description: This increase in the company's share price followed the board of directors' approval for a Bonus Equity Share issuance in the ratio of 1:1.

items.title: Torrent Power to invest Rs 64,000 crore in green projects; stock up 2%
items.description: Torrent Power shares started today's trading session on a positive note and continue to trade northward on the bourses

items.title: Addressing issues raised by protesting employees on internal matters: Sebi
items.description: The employees had alleged that top officials use unprofessional language, enforce extended working hours, and create an unrealistic work environment
